context.p: Reading about and understanding the safeguards will prevent injury and fire/electrical hazards.

step.cmd: Do not place cord, plug, or base of the ICE-60W in water or any liquid.
Please be cautious and supervise any children that are using or nearby the ICE-60W
Unplug the cord when you are setting up and cleaning the machine.
Keep body parts and utensils away from the ICE-60W while it is in motion.
Do not operate the appliance if there has been any sort of damage done to the machine. Get it fixed promptly.
Do not add any attachments as it may cause a fire or electrical hazard.
The cord should not hang or touch any hot surfaces.
Do not put the freezer bowl in any hot conditions to reduce risk of hazards and injury. Those conditions may include flames, hot plates, stoves, and the dishwasher.
Always unplug your appliance before storing it. You should not use your appliance when it is stored.

messagepanel.typeofhazard: THIS APPLIANCE IS FOR HOUSEHOLD USE ONLY!
messagepanel.howtoavoid: Do not use outdoors! If repairs are needed, notify a professor and they will contact an authorized service representative promptly.
